TEXT: The applicants are NORP nationals , both born in DATE . They are a married couple living in GPE , GPE . The first applicant is a ORG judge and the second applicant is a university teacher . Before the ORG they are represented by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE criminal proceedings were brought in ORG ( kihlakunnanoikeus , häradsrätt ) of Piikkiö . The applicants ' neighbours ( GPE , ORG and their daughter PS ) were charged with defamation , infringement of domestic peace and slander , among other offences . The first applicant was charged with minor theft . There was an order of a joinder of the CARDINAL cases . On DATE GPE was found guilty of slander and fines were imposed . He was ordered to pay the second applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL in compensation . The other charges were rejected as inadmissible or unfounded .

The applicants appealed to ORG ( hovioikeus , hovrätt ) of GPE claiming compensation and requesting their neighbours to be convicted . The judges of the third chamber of ORG , which dealt with the case , were ORG and N. As the appeal concerned the evaluation of a particular statement by a witness and this witness 's observations of the LOC , ORG decided to conduct an inspection on the site , i.e. the backyard of the applicants ' house . The inspection took place on DATE in the presence of judges ORG and N.
On DATE ORG found the charge against ORG to be unfounded rather than inadmissible but otherwise upheld ORG judgment .

On DATE criminal proceedings were instituted by the public prosecutor in ORG ( raastuvanoikeus , rådstuvurätt ) of GPE against ORG and TS , who had been witnesses in the above - mentioned trial , and against GPE , ORG and ORG . JE and TS were charged with giving false statements as a witness under oath . PS was charged with giving false statements as a witness . GPE and ORG were charged with inciting the above - mentioned offences . ORG was also charged with slander as she was accused of claiming that the applicants had done something which might endanger their good reputation ( the actual content of the slander is not mentioned in the file ) . Each of the applicants claimed ORG CARDINAL in compensation for moral damage .

On DATE the applicants brought additional private prosecution proceedings against GPE , ORG and ORG , charging ORG with attempted fraud and malicious accusation and GPE and ORG with incitement to those offences . The public prosecutor did not support these charges . There was an order of a joinder of the CARDINAL cases ( with the proceedings instituted on DATE ) .
On DATE ORG found ORG guilty of slander and rejected the rest of the charges . ORG was ordered to pay the applicants ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL each in compensation .

The applicants , the public prosecutor and ORG appealed to ORG of GPE . The appeals were examined by the third chamber of the court which had also conducted the inspection in the previous case in DATE . ORG were still sitting in this chamber . A chamber of ORG consists of CARDINAL judges .
On DATE ORG acquitted ORG and upheld the rest of ORG judgment . In its reasoning ORG made an explicit reference to its findings based on the inspection conducted during the earlier proceedings .
The applicants were refused leave to appeal by ORG ( korkein oikeus , högsta domstolen ) on DATE .

According to LAW , LAW , of the LAW of the Judicial Procedure ( oikeudenkäymiskaari , rättegångsbalken ) , as in force at the relevant time , a judge is disqualified when he has acted as a judge in another court in respect of the same case or when he has on a court order earlier decided on a question related to that case .
